statements: DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%City';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE 'New%';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier ABC';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Company XYZ';
DELETE FROM products WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND stock_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM products WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address = '123 Main Street');
DELETE FROM Product WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_address = 'New York');
DELETE FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id FROM Product);
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM orders WHERE order_quantity < 10);
